attributes.action: Require all major political parties to meet minimum democratic standards.
attributes.background: The Electoral Commission approved a privately owned limited company as a political party. The company is structured to give total control to a small number of members. Companies should not be permitted to masquerade as political parties. Require all parties to meet minimum democratic standards.

rejection.details:
Registration of political parties and regulation of party finance are matters for the Electoral Commission, which is independent of both the Government and Parliament.

You could raise this issue with the Electoral Commission. You can find out how to contact the Electoral Commission here:

https://www.electoralcommission.org.uk/contact-us
